mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, profile_img FROM profile WHERE user_name LIKE ('%' || #{name} || '%') or user_id LIKE ('%' || #{name} || '%') order by user_name asc

WITH -- 사용자들 another_u AS ( SELECT * FROM users WHERE id != #{user_id} ), -- 요청자 sel_u AS ( SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = #{user_id} ), -- 요청자 지역 sel_u_location AS ( SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(location_name, 1, INSTR(location_name, ' ')-1) AS location_sido FROM location WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM sel_u) ), -- 요청자 시,도 의 경우의 수 sel_u_location_list AS( SELECT l.location_id FROM location l WHERE l.location_name LIKE '%' || (SELECT location_sido FROM sel_u_location) || '%' ), -- 요청자와 같은 시,도에 사는 사람 sel_u_same_loc_users AS( SELECT a_u.id FROM another_u a_u WHERE a_u.location_id in(SELECT * FROM sel_u_location_list) order by id asc ), -- 유저 2차 필터링 sel_u_same_hash_users AS( SELECT user_id FROM user_hash WHERE user_id != #{user_id} GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_hash_id) >= 3 ) -- user01~ user 59
select * from profile p where p.user_id in(select * from sel_u_same_hash_users) and p.user_id in(select * from sel_u_same_loc_users)
